1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Behind the Bar features some of best bartenders in New York City sharing their drink recipes and industry experiences. Episode 1 includes hotspots Bedlam, PDT, Highlands, and Dram.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Jump back Behind the Bar with some of best bartenders in the industry sharing their drink recipes and favorite experiences. Behind the Bar 102 features the delicious Pickle Margarita of Lady Jay's, Saint Vitus of Greenpoint, and Queen Vic.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Behind the Bar is back with some of best bartenders in the industry sharing their drink recipes and experiences. Join here! for a look Behind the Bar at Ninth Ward, Summit Bar, and Rockbar!

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Come bar hopping with Here TV in NYC! At each stop, your friendly bartender serves up establishment info, mixology tips, a step-by-step cocktail recipe, and more! This episode features The Boiler Room, Gym Bar, and Poppi Kramer at The Stonewall Inn.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Come bar hopping with Here TV in NYC! At each stop, your friendly bartender serves up establishment info, mixology tips, a step-by-step cocktail recipe, and more! This episode features Huckleberry Bar, Spuyten Duyvil, and Industry Bar.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Come bar hopping with Here TV in NYC! At each stop, your friendly bartender serves up establishment info, mixology tips, a step-by-step cocktail recipe, and more! This episode features Royalton Hotel, Barracuda, and The Eagle NYC.

imdb.plot outline: After a long day, there is nothing better than a stiff cocktail! Join Here TV as we reveal the secrets of the best booze from Behind the Bar. Each episode includes interviews, bartender profiles, drink recipes and amazing stories from featured mixologists. Whether you enjoy extra gin in your juice or more mayhem in your mojito, we'll guide you through with the tips and know-how only a bartender can serve up.
imdb.title: Behind the Bar
plot: After a long day, there is nothing better than a stiff cocktail! Join Here TV as we reveal the secrets of the best booze from _Behind the Bar_ (qv). Each episode includes interviews, bartender profiles, drink recipes and amazing stories from featured mixologists. Whether you enjoy extra gin in your juice or more mayhem in your mojito, we'll guide you through with the tips and know-how only a bartender can serve up.
